name: Energy Wand Defender
description:
How to operate:

[  W, A,  D  ] key or arrow keys = Move

When the sphere runs out of energy, touch the orb on the far right to retrieve the sphere and replenish its energy.

Story:

The Witch of the North (a slime researcher) has come to rob you of the , an artifact that gives energy to structures.

Use the power of the wand to fight them off, and good luck!
